SQL.LOAD:
SELECT best_replacement_recon_wrk_id, file_processed_id, load_status, record_type, manufacturer, model, replacement_manufacturer, replacement_model, priority, reject_reason, reject_code, reject_msg_parms, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date FROM elp_best_replacement_recon_wrk WHERE best_replacement_recon_wrk_id =
:best_replacement_recon_wrk_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST:
SELECT BRW.best_replacement_recon_wrk_id, BRW.file_processed_id, BRW.load_status, BRW.record_type, BRW.manufacturer, BRW.model, BRW.replacement_manufacturer, BRW.replacement_model, BRW.priority, BRW.reject_reason, BRW.reject_code, BRW.reject_msg_parms, BRW.created_by, BRW.created_date, BRW.modified_by, BRW.modified_date, mc.MSG_PARAMETER_COUNT, (SELECT TRANSLATION FROM ELP_LABEL innerL Inner join elp_dict_item_translation innert on innert.DICT_ITEM_ID =
innerl.DICT_ITEM_ID and innert.LANGUAGE_ID = :language_id WHERE innerL.ui_prog_code = l.ui_prog_code ) Translated_MSG FROM elp_best_replacement_recon_wrk BRW left outer join (select MSG_CODE, LABEL_ID, MSG_PARAMETER_COUNT From elp_message_code inner join ELP_LIST_ITEM li ON msg_type = li.LIST_ITEM_ID AND li.code =
'DLREJECT' INNER JOIN ELP_LIST l ON l.LIST_ID = li.LIST_ID AND l.code = 'MSGTYPE' ) mc on mc.MSG_CODE = BRW.reject_code left outer join elp_label l on l.label_id = mc.label_id WHERE file_processed_id = :file_processed_id AND reject_reason IS NOT NULL
SQL.LOAD_REJECT_LIST: SELECT record_type, reject_reason FROM elp_best_replacement_recon_wrk WHERE file_processed_id = :file_processed_id AND reject_reason IS NOT NULL
SQL.UPDATE:
UPDATE elp_best_replacement_recon_wrk SET
best_replacement_recon_wrk_id=:best_replacement_recon_wrk_id, file_processed_id=:file_processed_id, load_status=:load_status, record_type=:record_type, manufacturer=:manufacturer, model=:model, replacement_manufacturer=:replacement_manufacturer, replacement_model=:replacement_model, priority=:priority, reject_reason=:reject_reason, reject_code=:reject_code, reject_msg_parms=:reject_msg_parms, created_by=:created_by, created_date=:created_date, modified_by=:modified_by, modified_date=:modified_date WHERE best_replacement_recon_wrk_id =
:best_replacement_recon_wrk_id AND NVL(modified_date,created_date) = NVL
(:modified_date,created_date)
